robotics.heading: Yuan Bot
robotics.author: FRC8811
robotics.description: Yuan Bot is a robot designed for the 2023 FIRST Robotics Competition game RAPID REACT. It is equipped with a 6-wheel drive system and a 4-bar linkage mechanism for shooting balls.
